Description: Limestone ostracon: on the recto a drawing in black ink representing three fishes around a circle; below, a summary sketch of a walking male figure (headless). On the verso, an incomplete drawing of a hawk head; in front of the head a summary sketch of a walking male figure (headless).
Curator's comments: Bibliography: S.R.K.Glanville, 'Journal of Egyptian Archaeology' 12 (1926), pp.76ff and pl.19,3 (recto only).
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2013, Apr - Jul, Paris, Louvre, L'Art Du Contour 2013/2014, Sept - Jan, Musée royaux d’art et d’histoire, Brussels, L'Art Du Contour
